newsitem.title: UK: Liberty launches direct pensions provider.
newsitem.headline: Liberty launches direct pensions provider.

text.p: British financial services and investment group Liberty International Holdings Plc said on Monday it launched direct pensions provider Liberty International Pensions Ltd.
The company, operating under the name PensionStore, will be the first in Britain to specialise exclusively in money purchase pension provision and will begin trade on Tuesday, Liberty said.
Liberty said there was a "severe social need" for increased pension provision in Britain.
